total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 3s in the input grid.

Q8: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 6s in the input grid.
Q9: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 4s in the input grid.
Q10: Create a new grid with the same dimensions as the input grid, but filled with 0s.
Q11: For each cell identified in Q1-Q9, replace the corresponding cell in the new grid with the number of the cell that surrounded it in the input grid.
